module.name: sysnetwork
module.summary: Policy for network configuration: ifconfig and dhcp client.

interface.name: sysnet_domtrans_dhcpc
interface.summary: Execute dhcp client in dhcpc domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_run_dhcpc
interface.summary: Execute DHCP clients in the dhcpc domain, and allow the specified role the dhcpc domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the clock domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the clock domain to use.

interface.name: sysnet_sigchld_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to the dhcp client.

interface.name: sysnet_kill_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send a kill signal to the dhcp client.

interface.name: sysnet_sigstop_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send a SIGSTOP signal to the dhcp client.

interface.name: sysnet_signull_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send a null signal to the dhcp client.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The domain sending the null signal.

interface.name: sysnet_signal_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send a generic signal to the dhcp client.

interface.name: sysnet_dbus_chat_dhcpc
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from dhcpc over dbus.

interface.name: sysnet_rw_dhcp_config
interface.summary: Read and write dhcp configuration files.

interface.name: sysnet_read_dhcpc_state
interface.summary: Read dhcp client state files.

interface.name: sysnet_read_config
interface.summary: Allow network init to read network config files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_dontaudit_read_config
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read network config files.

interface.name: sysnet_etc_filetrans_config
interface.summary: Create files in /etc with the type used for the network config files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_manage_config
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete network config files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_read_dhcpc_pid
interface.summary: Read the dhcp client pid file.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_delete_dhcpc_pid
interface.summary: Delete the dhcp client pid file.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_domtrans_ifconfig
interface.summary: Execute ifconfig in the ifconfig domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: sysnet_run_ifconfig
interface.summary: Execute ifconfig in the ifconfig domain, and allow the specified role the ifconfig domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the ifconfig domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the ifconfig domain to use.

interface.name: sysnet_exec_ifconfig
interface.summary: Execute ifconfig in the caller domain.

interface.name: sysnet_read_dhcp_config
interface.summary: Read the DHCP configuration files.

interface.name: sysnet_search_dhcp_state
interface.summary: Search the DHCP state data directory.

interface.name: sysnet_dhcp_state_filetrans
interface.summary: Create DHCP state data.

desc.p: This is added for DHCP server, as the server and client put their state files in the same directory.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created

interface.name: sysnet_dns_name_resolve
interface.summary: Perform a DNS name resolution.

interface.name: sysnet_use_ldap
interface.summary: Connect and use a LDAP server.

interface.name: sysnet_use_portmap
interface.summary: Connect and use remote port mappers.
